DOC.brief_summary: The study assesses the effect of a further 3 years adjuvant treatment with anastrozole vs. an untreated control group after initial 5 years of adjuvant hormone-therapy.
DOC.brief_title: 3 Years of Anastrozole vs. no Treatment as Extended Adjuvant Therapy for Postmenopausal Women With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: No disease recurrence at time of randomization, patients with breast cancer after surgery, 5 years (+/ 12 months) of prior endocrine therapy Premenopausal patients, unknown or negative receptor status, Secondary malignant tumor
